value:
I know the circumstances by which
everyone arrived here are different,
but some here are far too...friendly!$k$pA proper fighting force should have
a solid moral grounding!

Lord Pent dispatched my squad to
investigate the Dread Isle. There, we
were ambushed, and...and they all—

Discipline demands order in life. So...
are you getting enough sleep? I must
insist you turn in early tonight.

As a mercenary, I rely on others for
work, so I must always prove myself
worth my price. That is why I train.

A mercenary's grooming must be
sufficient to allow them to remain
in the presence of their employer.$k$pThat said, I may be due for a bath...

I am Fiora. I offer you greetings as an
envoy of $Nf.

I will do my best not to betray your
trust in my skills.

The secret to true strength is in the
little steps taken toward your goals
each and every day.

Oh, no...no... This can't be happening.
Not again...

Your generous patronage is much
appreciated. I will do all I can to
make it worth the price.

I am Fiora, Pegasus Knight of Ilia.
If you wish, I will swear an oath to
you, and my strength will be yours.

I must thank you from the bottom of
my heart for the consideration you've
shown me, $Nu.$k$pHowever, I must remind you, I am
a Pegasus Knight of Ilia. My place is
on the battlefield, facing your foes.$k$pFrom that, I require no safeguard.
We knights of Ilia live as mercenaries,
sending our earnings back home.$k$pYou are...kind to think of my needs,
particularly as far as my safety is
concerned. But, remember this...$k$pNothing makes me happier than
a chance to defy my employer's
expectations on the battlefield.$k$pI hope you will continue to give me
chances to do just that.
(attack exertion)
Here I go!
(damage exertion)
I let my guard down!
I will complete my mission.
I can fight on my own.
This is my job.
I'll show them a thing or two.
I misjudged our situation…
(giggle)
I am Fiora, a pegasus knight. Whatever the mission, I will give it my all.
Eek! You're like a child! You put me in mind of my sisters.
I bet I'm the worst sister in Ilia... We're always fighting.
Ilia is cold and snowy. That's why I'm in a foreign land working as a mercenary.
We should ensure the proper conduct of all. People's minds are not focused on their duties...

No matter how many tears
we shed, the snow will not melt.
Better to fight for my homeland.
I would continue fighting for you. Please, let me be of aid.
Right.
Oh, I see.
I'll fulfill our duty.
